SELECT list_num, list_regdate, list_title, list_writer, list_filename, list_comment FROM (SELECT a.*, rownum rnum FROM (SELECT * FROM booklist ORDER BY list_regdate DESC)a)
WHERE rnum<=4

SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.*, rownum rnum FROM (SELECT list_title, list_filename, count(*) rent_count FROM (SELECT br.list_num, bl.list_title, bl.list_filename FROM bookrent br, booklist bl WHERE br.list_num=bl.list_num AND br.rent_status=1) GROUP BY list_title,list_filename ORDER BY rent_count DESC)a)
WHERE rnum<=10
